description:
If you live in Columbia, South Carolina, or any of the surrounding areas and you have suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can turn to the Law Office of David L Hood for the aggressive advocacy and dedicated support that you need to help increase your chances of obtaining the justice you deserve.

Along with handling all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, including those arising from motor vehicle accidents, defective products, medical malpractice, mesothelioma and more, the law firm's legal professionals can also assist with obtaining your rightful Social Security Disability benefits. Since 1991, they have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for individuals and families in need.

As a result of their success, the law firm has grown to include 12 offices across the state, and David L. Hood is Notable peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell and has received many other top rankings and endorsements from his peers. In addition, he has earned Martindale-Hubbell's Gold Client Champion award, and his law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from those it has served.

To discuss your matter free of charge, you can contact the Law Office of David L Hood to schedule a no-cost case evaluation. In an effort to help keep you and your family safe in today's uncertain environment, the firm also offers virtual consultations by phone or teleconference.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
